message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,800,000. This is a great deal for you, considering it's worth $800,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,400,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This is still a fantastic deal for you, considering the value it brings to your business. Let's try to find a middle ground, I'm open to negotiating further.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $1,200,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,500,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it's still a substantial profit for you. If we can't reach an agreement on this price, I might have to explore other options.
Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but $1,500,000 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $1,300,000?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence and your willingness to negotiate, but $1,300,000 is still a little too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering the value you'll get out of the product. I'm feeling confident that this is a price we can both agree on.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,400,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $1,350,000?
